description: SLC issues guidance on how students should contact them.

details.body:
Student Finance England

For general information about student finance, you can check:

  • www.gov.uk/student-finance.
  • our Twitter, Facebook and Instagram, and our YouTube channel
  • our dedicated page for our latest guidance for students, parents and partners.

Repayment customers can log in to the online repayment service at www.gov.uk/sign-in-to-manage-your-student-loan-balance

You can sign in to your Student Finance account to:

  • check what stage your application is at
  • check how much and when you’ll be paid
  • change your personal or course details
  • reset your password

Visit our ‘How to’ guide for answers to common queries such as checking your application status, changing your application and updating your bank details!

Contact Student Finance England

Student Finance Wales

For general information, you can check:

  • www.studentfinancewales.co.uk
  • our Twitter and Facebook, and our YouTube channel

Repayment customers can log in to the online repayment service at www.gov.uk/sign-in-to-manage-your-student-loan-balance

Contact Student Finance Wales

Student Finance Northern Ireland

For general information, you can check www.studentfinanceni.co.uk

Repayment customers can log in to the online repayment service at www.gov.uk/sign-in-to-manage-your-student-loan-balance

Contact Student Finance Northern Ireland

Tuition fee-only funding students

Student Finance Services
0141 243 3570
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Saturday and Sunday, 9am to 4pm
Closed on bank holidays

Please note, this line is only for students who can’t get student finance through Student Finance England, Student Finance Wales or Student Finance Northern Ireland.

If you’re not sure if this is you, and you normally live in:

  • England, go to www.gov.uk/student-finance/who-qualifies
  • Wales, go to www.studentfinancewales.co.uk
  • Northern Ireland, go to www.studentfinanceni.co.uk

Student Awards Agency Scotland

For payment information, you should check the SAAS payment guide before you contact us.

SLC Loan payment enquiries

Read our guidance for students from Scotland page.

Contact Student Loans Company

SAAS application, bursary or grant payment enquiries

You should contact SAAS for all SAAS application, award notice, bursary or grant payments enquiries.

Repayments

For general information you can check:

  • www.gov.uk/repaying-your-student-loan
  • our Twitter and Facebook pages

For information on how to contact SLC for general repayment enquiries, visit www.gov.uk/contact-student-loans-company.

You’ll also find information on how to contact SLC for:

  • overpayment enquiries
  • enquiries if you have an arrears balance

Customer Relations

Contact the Student Loans Company if you want to make a complaint.

Appeal a decision

An appeal is a formal request to the Student Loans Company asking them to review a decision about whether you can get financial help and if so how much.

Read the guidance and complete the appeals form.

Report Suspected Fraud

Financial Crime Prevention Unit
0300 100 0059
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5:30pm
Closed on bank holidays
